original_text: (for that righteous man, living among them day after day, was tormented in his righteous soul by the lawless deeds he saw and heard)—
korean_text: (이는 이 의인이 그들 중에 거하여 날마다 저 불법한 행실을 보고 들음으로 그 의로운 심령이 상함이라)

sentences.original_text: living among them day after day
was tormented in his righteous soul
sentences.korean_translation: 그 의로운 혼 속에서 괴로움을 당했습니다

sentences.original_text: by lawless deeds he saw and heard
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 보고 들은 무법한 행위들로 인해
